name: clipboard-type
title: Clipboard Type
description: Clipboard Type allows you to paste values of your clipboard, in the places where direct pasting is not allowed, like many web forms or RDP where clipboard is not synced. With Clipboard Type first value of clipboard is typed using internal api rather using OS pasting command
author: krishna_bhanushali

commands.name: type-clipboard
commands.title: Type Clipboard
commands.description: Will take the value from clipboard history and will type it out

preferences.name: delay
preferences.title: Typing Speed
preferences.description: Choose how quickly characters are typed

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
